list-item.p: to optimize selection criteria and quality indicators for the target population for lung cancer screening in the Czech population
to compare the influence of screening on the stage of lung cancer at the time of the diagnosis with the stage distribution in an unscreened population
to estimate the impact on life-years lost according to the stage-specific cancer survival and stage distribution in the screened population
to calculate the cost-effectiveness of the screening program
to assess the potential for opportunistic screening of non-communicable diseases.
